title: AI startups positioned to transform India's IT services, despite SaaS setbacks
description: As global AI agents begin to automate legacy migrations, Indian IT firms face a valuation crisis, prompting venture capital firms like Lightspeed to hunt for entrepreneurs who can increase margins through automation.

title: AI firms help patients by making diagnostics faster & way cheaper
description: Tricog Health has analysed nearly 33 million ECG scans since 2014, using AI to support hospitals and diagnostic centres. Chains like Manipal, Aster DM, Apollo, and Yashoda are adopting AI tools for radiology and oncology, helping spot conditions faster and sometimes detecting what humans miss. These technologies aim to reduce diagnostic time and improve patient outcomes.

title: Top AI Automation Agencies in 2026
description: From AI workflows to enterprise automation, these companies quietly shape the future of businesses.

title: This AI Giant May Advance 46%, According to Wall Street. And Right Now, It's Dirt Cheap
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) stocks have offered investors major gains in recent years.
